headerDisplay:
MyQ LiftMaster and Chamberlain Plugin for HomeBridge (API 2.0).

[homebridge-myq2](https://github.com/hjdhjd/homebridge-myq2) is a HomeBridge plugin to interact with MyQ Smart Garage door openers, made primarily by LiftMaster and Chamberlain.

name.title: Place Name
name.description: Physical location where this MyQ Home Bridge is installed.

email.title: MyQ Username
email.description: Email address used for your MyQ account.

password.title: MyQ Password
password.description: Password used for your MyQ account.

verbose.title: Debug Logging Verbosity
verbose.description: Logging verbosity for debugging purporses. (Default = false)

openDuration.title: Open Duration
openDuration.description: Time in seconds to check that the garage door has finished opening. (Default = 15)

closeDuration.title: Close Duration
closeDuration.description: Time in seconds to check that the garage door has finished closing. (Default = 25)

shortPoll.title: Short Poll Interval
shortPoll.description: Polling interval in seconds to use when the door state changes. (Default = 5)

shortPollDuration.title: Short Poll Duration
shortPollDuration.description: Duration in seconds to use the Short Poll Interval. (Default = 600)

gateways.title: Gateways
gateways.description: An array of gateway IDs or names to add. This is only useful or needed if you have multiple MyQ gateways. (Default = [])

form.title: Advanced Configuration (Optional)
form.description: This step is not required. HomeBridge with API 2.0 can handle configurations in the HomeKit app.
